metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6307 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
LibVNC before commit ca2a5ac02fbbadd0a21fabba779c1ea69173d10b contains heapuse-after-free vulnerability in server code of file transfer extension thatcan result remote code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6307` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.3
libvncserver-config - 0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.3
libvncserver1 - 0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.3').
